alert.note: Alert for Apple and Lucerne Valleys; San Bernardino County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued May 11 at 2:20AM PDT until May 11 at 6:00PM PDT by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 6 PM PDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...West winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...San Bernardino County Mountains and Apple and Lucerne Valleys. * WHEN...From 11 AM this morning to 6 PM PDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...In the deserts, areas of blowing dust could reduce visibility at times.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Apple and Lucerne Valleys; San Bernardino County Mountains
